description: These pork and prawn meatballs are juicy and flavoursome cooked in Asian broth, delicious with stir fried vegetables or noodles.
name: Asian Pork & Prawn Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups chicken stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Add the prawns, pork, chilli, garlic and ginger paste and half of the coriander to a food processor and blitz until smooth. Roll into 20 meatballs with your hands, place on a plate and chill in the fridge for 30 minutes.
Heat the sesame oil in a large, deep pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs for 5-6 minutes until browned all over.

Pour over the stock, lime juice, sriracha and soy sauce, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes until the meatballs are cooked through. Serve with the rest of the coriander on top.
